english.segment1: I can see a change in me. Since you came into my heart. I can find a peace inside. Since you came into my heart
english.segment2: I can feel this heart of mine. Falling for my King. I can feel this love of Yours. All around
english.segment3: CHORUS. Falling down like rain. Your love is falling on my face. Falling down like rain. Your love is here. Your love is near
english.segment4: Love is here in place of fear. Since You came into my heart. Gone is doubt, now faith abounds. Since You came into my heart.
